doc:
Helen Shaw (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Shaw_(actress) 0 Helen Shaw (July 25, 1897 – September 8, 1997) was an American actress. She is best known for playing a kindly old woman on such shows as Diff'rent Strokes and Highway to Heaven. She played Mrs. Dempsey in the 1983 film Twilight Zone: The Movie and Steve Martin's grandmother in the 1989 comedy Parenthood. She was a humorous guest during her first appearance on the Tonight Show with Johnny Carson on 6 October 1989. She died in 1997 at the age of 100. Helen_Shaw ( July_25_,_1897 – September_8_,_1997 ) was an_American_actress . She is_best_known for playing a_kindly_old_woman on such_shows as Diff'rent_Strokes and Highway to Heaven . She played Mrs._Dempsey in the_1983_film_Twilight_Zone : The_Movie and Steve_Martin 's_grandmother in the_1989_comedy_Parenthood . She was a_humorous_guest during her_first_appearance on the_Tonight_Show with Johnny_Carson on 6_October_1989 . She died in 1997 at the_age of 100 .
